content.rendered:
1)Venkat Sivanand Kumar
Managing Director of Gram Tarang Inclusive Development Services holds B.Com (Bachelors of Commerce) degree from Osmania University and management degree from Xavier Institute of Management, Bhubaneswar. Possess Two years experience with Agribusiness Group at ICICI Bank and 15 months with Intellecap, a development consulting company. Started a microfinance consultancy in 2009 and worked with tier 2 and tier 3 MFIs especially from A.P, Orissa, Karnataka. Area of expertise includes Retail Banking, Ratings, Microfinance Institution Loan Portfolio Audits, Microfinance Institution Development, Business Planning, Financial Modeling & Investment Banking.
Mobile +91 7382092355 | Email Id: venkat@gramtarang.org


2) Jay Shankar Prasad hails from Madhubani district of Bihar and holds a Bachelors degree in Agricultural Sciences from UAS Bangalore apart from a PGDRM from XIM, Bhubaneswar. He joined Gram Tarang in 2010 and currently working as Zonal Manager. His area of expertise includes supply chain management, marketing, Business planning and trainings.

3)Suman Acharjee is a Microbiology Graduate from the university of Burdwan, West Bengal and holds PGDM in Marketing and Finance from Centurion School of Rural Enterprises Management, Parlakhemundi, Odisha. Has started his career as a Field Sales Officer in Intas Pharmaceuticals LTd. and later on joined Share Microfin Ltd. as a Managment Trainee. Has five years of experience in different sector like pharma sales, Micro finance and Financial Inclusion respectively. At present he represents Gram Tarang as a State Coordinator for West Bengal.

4)Haren Hazarika did his MBA in Marketing from Tilak Maharashtra University, Pune; PGDBA from Magnus School of Business, Pune. He has more than 5 years of experience in ‘INDIAN RED CROSS SOCIETY’ and even worked in various capacities in organizations like INDIABULLS, ICICI HOME FINANCE and JUSTDIAL COMMUNICATION PVT. LTD. He joined Gram Tarang in 2011 and currently working as a State Coordinator of North-East India. His area of expertise includes Financial Inclusion & Trainings.

5) Y.Akash Roshan did his BBA in Human Resources from the Berhampur University and MBA in Rural Management from Centurion University, Odisha. He joined Gram Tarang in 2012 and currently working as State Manager of Odisha.

6) Amit Kumar did his PGD in Rural Management from Xavier Institute of Management, Bhubaneswar and Bachelor of Forestry from Sam Higginbottom Institute of Agriculture Technology and Sciences, Allahabad. He has completed summer Internship from FINO. Currently Amit is working in GTIDS and coordinating on data for its entire operation , across all states.

7) Suresh Kumar holds a B.Com (Hons.,) degree from SKCG College, Paralakhemundi and received 8 diplomas that include DCA, PGDCA, Diploma in Networking, Diploma in Web designing, Diploma in Hardware, Diploma in AutoCAD (Civil), Diploma in Multimedia, and Diploma in DTP. He has over 10 years of experience in hardware networking and looks after all the aspects of ICT (Information and Communication Technology) in Gram Tarang.
